column1: Erasmus Mundus Master of Science in Theoretical Chemistry and Computational Modelling (Leuven)
column5: The Erasmus Mundus Master of Theoretical Chemistry and Computational Modelling (TCCM) is a joint initiative of seven European universities, including KU Leuven and coordinated by the Universidad Aut√≥noma de Madrid, that trains students to master a wide range of theoretical and computational tools on the forefront of research in molecular
